summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5418 for the improvement of The Alley in Blocks 38 and 39, Carleton Park Addition, and Block 6, Briarcliff Addition, being the alley in the block bounded by West Pay Street, Crestmont Place, Westmont Way, West Viewmont Way, 40th Avenue West, and Parkmont Place; by grading, paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 67607, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
